page.title: 18Housing Part 3
page.content:
HOUSING IN MY VILLAGE
In Maxey most houses are detached but in Tuckers Nook, (one road), there are some bungalows. In my village my favourite house is Abbey House, because it is haunted. On Sundays most people wash their cars or clean their windows and do their gardens in our neighborhood. About a month ago my grandma moved house from near Rainbow, (a supermarket in Market Deeping) to Tuckers Nook and my dad swapped her little shed for a big one. A long time ago the vicar moved next door to us.
This piece of writing reflects what one eight year old boy considers to be the important aspects of housing to him.
